Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:25:25 UTC – Details)



Smartphone Control: Connect smart lamp with Go_sund_App to manage smart home conveniently. Feel free to power on/off, dim brightness, change colors or scenes of the table lamp with easy control via App. Only support 2.4GHz WiFi, no hub required
Hands-Free Voice Control: The bedside lamp works with Alexa and Google Home to free up your hands; You can switch on/off and even change the colors of your lamp by simple voice command. No worries about can’t find the light switch when you walk into a dark room.
Tap Top to Power on/off: The creative built-in touch sensor allows you to tap twice on the top of the lamp to turn it on or off. Manually work with the slide area to change brightness and colors. It is convenient to switch white and color modes with the front button directly
16 Million Colors and 8 Scenes: With 16 million colors, you can select any color in the spectrum via your phone App to create an atmosphere such as a romantic dinner or warm sleep. Scenes are able to be created for your desired ambiance, like multiple colors, 1% – 100% brightness, and color-changing speed.
Timer & Schedule: The smart lamp can be turned on or off automatically according to the time you set. Or set a schedule to turn off the lamp based on your family’s sleep schedule.

4

(as of Nov 30,2022 08:25:25 UTC – Details)

Price: $21.20 - $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:12:46 UTC – Details)

Product Description

COLOR
Multi Color White Blue Colorful White Red

Super Easy to Install

The car interior lights are pre-installed with optical fibers, which can be directly inserted into the gap of the center console, and the operation is simple.

High Quality LED Strip

Our car led lights are bright, waterproof and anti-collision. High-brightness led strip lights, lighting is more uniform. The colors and light effects are brighter.

Music Sync

The control button of the interior car lights can switch between different lighting modes with one key control. The controller has a built-in high-sensitivity microphone, which allows the interior lights to change with the rhythm of your favorite songs.

Car Decoration

With this interior light, you won’t get bored while driving. The lights of the light bar can dance with the music, as if you are in a fairy tale world, surrounded by “rainbow”, and accompany you through the long road.

Decorate Your Room

Our led strip lights are romantic creators, with soft and gorgeous lighting adding mood. Allows you to relax your mind while staying in your room.

For Family and Friends

The colorful lights of the LED strips create an exclusive party space for you, allowing you to have a party with your family and friends at any time. Create colorful life

【2022 Upgraded Version,Super Easy to Install】：The optical fiber of interior car lights has been pre-installed, and it can be directly inserted into the gap of the center console, and the operation is simple. Car led lights with USB plugs, plug and play, save more time. Suitable for RVs, camping cars, trailers, cars, trucks, SUVs, ATVs, boats, golf carts, etc.
【Sensitive Music Sensor】: The interior car lights system is equipped with a sound sensor to synchronize the car led lights with the music beat. The LED light strips will automatically change with the rhythm of music or sound to enhance your driving pleasure.
【Multiple Modes & 16 Million Colors】: Our car led lights has 3 light flashing modes, rhythm mode, cycle mode and fixed color mode, which can be switched by pressing the remote control button. There are 16 million colors in the luminous car interior lights, and you can adjust the color you like according to your mood or activity.
【2-wire Concealed Design & Safety 】: This led lights for car adopts a convenient, flexible and unique two-in-one design, which makes it easier to hide the thread in the gap, without worrying about exposed wiring or untidy appearance.The interior car lights is DC5v, built-in fuse, with short circuit protection and memory function. It has good waterproof performance and extremely low heat.
【Perfect Gift and Customer Service】: This Led Car Interior Lights are colorful gifts for your friends and familly in holiday season, especially in christams. Theses strip lights are fun accessories for women, men and teens.Our professional customer service team is on call at any time to provide excellent, lightning-fast response to each of your questions.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

ViprTech Snowstorm (AMD) Black

Specifications: CPU: AMD Ryzen 3 2200G (4-Core @ 3.7Ghz Turbo) Graphics: AMD Radeon Vega 8 2GB RAM: 8GB DDR4 Primary Storage: 128GB M.2 SSD (Boot Drive) Secondary Storage: 500GB 7200RPM HDD NOTE:

Prebuilt gaming computer with awesome built-in RGB. This PC is not only a great entry point into PC gaming, it’s also great for everyday use, editing, day trading / crypto trading, and more!

Games tested:

Counter-Strike: Global Offensive Far Cry

Grand Theft Auto V Overwatch

DoTA 2 Rocket League

Fortnite Minecraft

Roblox Team Fortress 2

League of Legends Overwatch

Although we test each build to ensure it can handle most popular games, please check the minimum specs for the specific game you want to play to make sure this computer meets those.

Insane Bootup Times

Take advantage of insanely fast bootup and loading times with the included 128GB M.2 SSD (brand/model may vary).

Built-In Gorgeous RGB Lighting

Light up your rig and showcase your internals with the ViprTech built-in RGB lighting system, a must have for any true gaming PC.

Why choose us?

Affordable

Every PC is designed with affordability in mind, while preserving quality and reliability. Thus, keeping more money in your pocket.

Extensive Testing Process

Before a PC leaves our facility, it goes through a rigorous benchmarking and stress testing process, faulty or underperforming components are identified and replaced.

Made in the USA

Every one of our PCs is hand built by PC experts in the USA, providing jobs to Americans and ensuring we are able to provide the best quality systems possible.

Superior Support

We perform all technical support in-house. No more sitting on hold for hours, waiting in a call queue, or endlessly navigating through phone menu options, if you call you get a real person right away. We believe this is the only way to do it right.

System: AMD Ryzen 3 2200G (3.7GHz Turbo), AMD Radeon Vega 8 Graphics, 8GB DDR4 RAM, 128GB M.2 SSD, 500GB HDD, Genuine Windows 10 Pro, RGB lighting enabled case
Showcase your internals with the built-in RGB lighting system, a must have for any gaming PC and sure to make your rig stand out. Controlled via a button on the case.olled via a button on the case.
Enjoy insanely fast bootup times with the included 128GB M.2 Boot SSD, while still having plenty of storage with the 500GB secondary drive. Easily add additional storage if desired or add more DDR4 RAM (supports up to 32GB) or a dedicated GPU for even better performance
Tested to run games such as: CSGO, Far Cry, GTA V, Overwatch, DoTA 2, Rocket League, Fortnite, Minecraft, Roblox, Team Fortress 2, and many more!
Every ViprTech PC is built by hand in the USA and is stress-tested extensively before shipping. We stand behind our product and include a free 1 year warranty.

(as of Nov 29,2022 23:43:39 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Smart Lighting Expert

How did we get our start?

Break out of the box and make ordinary things more interesting.

Why do we love what we do?

Interest will be the source of all motivation, and work can make your ideas come true one by one.

What problem are we solving?

We have been making progress by maintaining an outstanding “Quality Products” ratio for our products.

DIY Modes: Car led lights has 16 million colors, or custom the colors and adjust the brightness through the smart app’s color palette, Let you easily create your own car atmosphere.Perfect for decorating cars for Halloween and Christmas.
Scenario Modes: Led lights for car has 28 dynamic modes for you to choose, or customize the parameters of led strip lights (automatic, flash, jump,fade in and out,brightness adjustment,speed adjustment) Please feel free to use your imagination.
Dynamic Music Sync: The lights of led car light will change in sync with the rhythm of the song or music. Let the lights dance with your music and enhance your driving pleasure.
3 Types Control: 44-key RF remote control with its own battery, 4-button control box with built-in sensitive microphone, and Bluetooth Smart APP.
2-Line Design: 1 main line separated into 2 branch lines, as long as the line is hidden under the car mat, without having to worry about exposed wiring or an untidy appearance.the best choice for truck accessories and jeep accessories.
3 Installation Methods: Strong Glue, Screws, Hook and Loop Tape, built-in overvoltage fuse, led interior car lights can adheres very well to different surfaces and very safe,extremely low-heat, touchable.
Gifts for Men and Women: These RGB music car led floor lights always bring joy to him or her, are easy to use, and are a great choice for a birthday gift.

Read more

For Friend:

It is now, let’s create a car light party together.

For Family:

Bring your children together to enjoy the fun of intelligent technology

For Lovers:

Let the colorful lights accompany you and your lover on a romantic trip.

Read more

Read more

Read more

Package Contains

Car Cigarette lighter / LED Strip Light / Fuse / RF Remote Control / Hook and Loop Tape / Screws / Cable Ties / User Manuals

3 Installation Method

Strong Glue / Screws / Hook and Loop Tape.

Compatibility

It works on any vehicle that has a 12v power adapter. Also known as the cigarette lighter.

Working Temperature

-10℃~45℃/(14℉~113℉)

Specification:

  • Chips: 5050 SMD
  • Input: AC 100-240V / 50-60Hz
  • Output: DC 12V=2A
  • Power: Car Cigarette lighter
  • Light strip length: 230mm / (9in)
  • Power cord length: 460mm / 1160mm / 1720mm (18in*45in*64in)

Can it be set to automatically come on when you enter the car？

  • Yes if you leave it plugged in with the power button on, it will power on and off with your car’s ignition and it will keep the color you set last time.

How to connect the Smart APP?

  1. Scan the QR code on the box to download the smart APP
  2. Open your phone Bluetooth to search for led lights devices, device name format: KSxx-xxxxxx
  3. Forbid to click the led lights device name directly, they will be connected automatically when you enter the APP.
  4. Enter the smart APP, click car light to start your technology journey.

They’re broken,can I get replacements?

  • Yes,Don’t worry, Don’t be shy, please tell us that if there is any quality problem with the product, We will help you until you are satisfied.

User Guide:

  • Use “cloth” or “paper towel” to clean the surface of the object where the car led lights will be installed.
  • Separate the tape from the backing layer.Paste the led strip lights on the surface of the object and press hard to make it fit more evenly and tightly.
  • The adhesive strength of the glue is related to time, the adhesive strength after the first paste is 40% of its maximum adhesion, and it takes 72 hours to reach the maximum adhesive strength.
  • If you have any question about our product, please go to your Amazon product page “Sold” – “Question”.
